description:
B2Bx is an services marketplace that directly connects brands and businesses with curated and vetted B2B Experts to create a seamless marketplace for both buyer and expert to engage. B2B Experts in the network have built significant followings over traditional business channels such as LinkedIn. Their trusted voices are valued in both the B2C and B2B contexts.
 
In engaging with B2B Experts through B2Bx, business owners can cut through the channel noise and marketing challenges of a fragmented media world. With B2Bx, engagement is direct between business and expert, and there is a cost only if an expert agrees to engage.
name: B2Bx
tagline: The worlds first B2B global services marketplace. Work with B2B experts to impact your business & amplify your marketing

updates.text:
We are now B2Bxperts.com!

Over the last 2 years we’ve been working to connect brands with business leaders around the world. We’ve been able to help hundreds of brands build insights, improve their targeted marketing and amplify their business growth activities. 

In the process we learned that the most successful projects were collaborative - where industry knowledge and expertise made all the difference.

To more accurately reflect the amazing services and capabilities our experts deliver for clients, we have rebranded the marketplace as B2Bxperts.com. 

From today you will see a much larger range of services offered by our B2Bxperts and be able to quickly and easily book and brief world-class business experts directly.

We look forward to helping you grow your business by connecting you with a network of the world’s leading business-to-business professionals to deliver service expertise on-demand.

The B2Bx Team
#business #growth #marketing
